title: cultural_data_Museum_of_Setúbal
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.realizasom.conventojesus.
Application Name: Museum of Setúbal.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: The APP of the Museum of Setúbal / Convent of Jesus offers audio versions with audiodescription, in Portuguese, English and Castilian.With a simple and intuitive interface, the visitor can access the intended contents in multiple ways:- search in an ordered list;- numeric code entry corresponding to each information point;- navigation through the museum plant.In addition to these forms of access, the visitor can simply point the camera of their mobile device to each work and let the APP automatically identify the intended content. As simple as that, and without the need for any type of signage or additional hardware.The audio information is complemented by other content in text format, as well as a gallery of images.Once downloaded to your mobile device, you do not need an Internet connection for your operation.Through this new interpretation solution, the Museum of Setúbal / Convento de Jesus will be able to get to know its visitors better, through the collection and statistical treatment of information.This is another initiative of the Municipality of Setúbal, in partnership with the company Realizasom.Read moreCollapse.
